name: NDB-28 Repeater
description:
Manufacturer: MaxOx
Item Type: Neutron Repeater
Size: 2
Featuring a sleek, scientific design, the MaxOx NDB-28 is the next step in serious stopping power. Twin barrels overlap blasts for sustained neutron fire that remains effective at short to medium range.
description_cn:
制造商：MaxOx
物品类型：中子速射炮
尺寸：2
具有时尚，科学的设计，MaxOx NDB-28拥有新一代的阻止能力。双管双重爆发持续中子火力，中短程都有效。
